maqras.text: Hav ili really wanted mobilize ili prepar gxi thoroughly! Di disliked their participation tial Li discouraged them; ili told Rest behind those rest behind
Hav ili mobilized vi ili kre confusion kauxz disput divisions vi! Kelk da vi est apt auxskult al them! DI est fully aware da transgressors
Ili streb stern confusion vi en des preter, confounded materi vi. truth ultimately prevails di plan port them
Kelk da them dir Don me permission rest ne trud such hardship me En fakt, ili tiel incurred terrible hardship; Infer surrounding disbelievers
Io bon okaz vi ili dolor kaj affliction befalls vi ili dir Ni told vi as ili turn gxoj
dir Nothing okaz us ki DI dekret us. Li est our Lord Mastr En DI believers fid
Dir Vi nur expect us 1 de 2 bon ajx (victory martyrdom) while ni expect por vi condemnation el DI retribution el Him je our man! Do wait ni wait vi
dir Spend volont unwillingly. Nothing akcept vi vi est evil popol
Ki prevent acceptance their spending est ti ili disbelieved en DI His messenger when ili observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) ili observ them lazily when ili don charity ili did tial grudgingly
(Ne impon their mon their infan! DI KAUXZ these EST sources retribution them en this life when ILI MORT) their ANIM depart while ILI est disbelievers
Ili jxur DI ili aparten vi while ili do ne aparten vi; ili est divisive popol
Se ili trov rifugx kav fel met ili ir gxi rushing
Kelk da them kritik your distribution charities; se ili don therefrom ili igx sat ili ne don therefrom ili igx objectors
Ili sat ki DI His messenger don them. Ili dir DI suffices us. DI testament proviz por us His bounties KAJ tial VOL His messenger. Ni streb nur DI
